## View.deref() method

Returns view's value. If the view has a transformer, the transformed value is returned. The transformer is only run once per value change. See class comments about difference between lazy/eager behaviors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deref(): T | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`T | undefined`
